author: V. Geetanath
title: University of Hyderabad chosen as Covid-19 testing centre
description: University of Hyderabad (UoH) has been identified as COVID 19 testing centre under the city clusters identified by Department of Biotechnology (DBT) to scale up the testing capacity for COVID-19.The H
content:
University of Hyderabad (UoH) has been identified as COVID 19 testing centre under the city clusters identified by Department of Biotechnology (DBT) to scale up the testing capacity for COVID-19.
